title: I tried to install today's Android update on my Pixel 3XL. Failed
content:
It booted to a black screen that says:

Fastboot Mode

After various details, it says:
Device state: locked
Boot slot: b
Enter reason: reboot bootloader

In the upper right, it defaults to Start, and if I hold the power button, it restarts without the update.

After starting back up, there's a notification:

Couldn't update
Installation problem

(but no details)

I hit the Try again button with the same result.
